entry.data:
SUNNY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
